data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9DTQXUsIn6MQ7kNvgFmTjUq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBts_U4vcjU3kHB0aqmjkVLxwY8drrV-i0-s1blp1URjw&oe=66E571B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RclBYND49dYQ7kNvgGKe8ST&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9LTtxr7ZEl31IJJsRLwQM8RkgADmen6PlV0sWkI1hvA&oe=66E57F52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
